title: override.terminaltotaldifficulty flag overrides erigon genesis configuration values
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2022.99.99-dev-ecf528d5`

OS & Version: linux

Commit hash : ecf528d56a059805754337c98156b9056ad34409

#### Expected behaviour
The override.terminaltotaldifficulty flag should override the terminal total difficulty.

#### Actual behaviour
When using the flag it changes the engine back to ethhash (if it was running in clique for example) and reverts the ChainID to 1337

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
` ./build/bin/erigon init --datadir /tmp/erigon_issue /ethereum/git/public/ethereum-testnet-bootstrapper/data/erigon-genesis.json`
`cp -r /tmp/erigon_issue /tmp/erigon_issue2`
`./build/bin/erigon --datadir /tmp/erigon_issue `
